name: Copper City Aviation Services, LLC.
about: Copper City Aviation Services, LLC, based in Bisbee, Arizona, has been providing professional flight training since 1992. Founded by Eric and Cheryl, both graduates of the Professional Pilot Program, the school offers training for both recreational and career pilots. With a modern fleet of efficient aircraft, Copper City Aviation emphasizes high-quality instruction and a safe learning environment. Eric and Cheryl bring decades of experience to their teaching, ensuring students receive comprehensive and personalized training. Contact us for scheduling and rates to start your aviation journey with experienced instructors in a beautiful South Eastern Arizona setting.
